A = [5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 4576.8 4520.18 4574.02 5000 5000 5000 4574.25 4520.85 4578.51 5000 5000 5000 5000 4560.34 4433.52 4166.09 4102.85 4160.12 4426.55 4456.96 4426.64 4160.51 4103.98 4169.67 4449.81 4547.05 5000 4500.8 4144.44 3983.71 3790.3 3731.13 3781.02 3962.48 3998.56 3962.62 3781.5 3732.45 3794.29 3999.49 4117.42 4383.79 4056.29 3765.19 3601.96 3449.54 3396.15 3437.59 3569.36 3603.88 3569.53 3438.11 3397.48 3453.07 3613.24 3728.29 3897.5 3664.11 3421.97 3266.97 3139.67 3091.72 3125.96 3226.77 3257.89 3226.94 3126.48 3092.96 3142.41 3273.07 3378.57 3493.56 3316.12 3110.75 2967.24 2856.26 2813.05 2841.7 2922.4 2950.04 2922.58 2842.2 2814.16 2858.18 2968.36 3063.29 3146.69 3004.52 2827.13 2695.64 2595.42 2556.34 2580.84 2648.21 2672.77 2648.38 2581.3 2557.31 2596.67 2692.06 2777.22 2841.97 2722.9 2567.12 2447.26 2353.9 2318.49 2340.01 2398.56 2420.55 2398.71 2340.44 2319.36 2354.74 2439.2 2515.79 2569.92 2466.21 2327.37 2218.52 2129.01 2097.03 2116.46 2169.34 2189.21 2169.48 2116.85 2097.81 2129.77 2206.05 2275.23 2324.12 2230.45 2105.04 2006.73 ];



surf(meshX, meshY, meshZ),shading interp,colormap(jet(256)), lighting phong,colorbar,title 'Difusion del calor en un Alto Horno para Acero',zlabel('temperatura *C'),xlabel('X = R*cos(Theta)'), ylabel('Y = R*sin(theta)');
